author: Neil Irwin
title: "It's almost embarrassing": Lobster price shock hits restaurants
description: The lobster price shock is a microcosm of the U.S. economy.
content:
Lobster prices have soared so much that restaurants are either giving their customers sticker shock, or taking them off the menu entirely.
Why it matters: The lobster price shock isn't just a supplyâ€¦ [+1121 chars]
